scripts.build:md: npm run convert && npm run dedup && npm run check-sequence
scripts.build:all: npm run convert && npm run dedup && npm run check-sequence && npm run rename:id && npm run index:readme && npm run md:json && npm run index:pages
scripts.convert: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./dist/index.js --in "../docs/" --out "./markdown" --pattern "detallerollo.php-id=*\\&pagina=*.htm" --images true --concurrency 8
scripts.dedup: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./dist/clean-dedup.js --src ./markdown --dest ./complete --duplicates ./duplicates --commit
scripts.check-sequence: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./dist/check-sequence.js --dir ./complete --checkPages true --pageStartAt 1
scripts.rename:id: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./dist/rename-to-id.js --dir ./complete --commit
scripts.md:json: npm run build && node ./dist/md-to-json.js --src complete --out public/docs/rollo --index public/docs/rollo/docs-index.json
